ul.li: jpcap @ sourceforge: Java Packet Capture Library
jpcap @ netresearch: Java Packet Capture Library
LBNL's Network Research Group: Original developer of libpcap, a *nix library for capturing network packets. libpcap is the underlying packet capture layer used on non-windows platforms.

WinPCap: Windows port of the pcap library for capturing network packets. WinPCap also offers several windows specific enhancements. WinPCap is the underlying packet capture layer used on the windows platform.
